metadata.dcterms:title: Alberta Survey on Physical Activity - 2018
metadata.dcterms:creator: Alberta Centre for Active LIving
metadata.dcterms:description: The Centre for Active Living administered the 2018 Alberta Survey on Physical Activity. This survey of households across the province of Alberta continues to enable academic researchers, government departments, and non-profit organizations to explore the topic in a structured research framework and environment. Research questions are asked together with demographic questions in a telephone interview of Alberta households.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Arts and Humanities
Social Sciences
metadata.dcterms:isReferencedBy: Population Research Laboratory (Department of Sociology, University of Alberta), 2018, "Alberta Survey, 2016A", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/ICWH57, UAL Dataverse, V1, doi, https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/ICWH57
